options.command: node --experimental-strip-types ./src/module-generators/generateModules.ts && node --eval "const fs=require('node:fs');fs.rmSync('dist',{recursive:true,force:true});fs.mkdirSync('dist/modules',{recursive:true});fs.mkdirSync('dist/projects',{recursive:true});" && cp src/modules/*.8f4e dist/modules/ && cp src/projects/*.8f4e dist/projects/
